entities.name: noble
entities.description: Neville is described as being frightened at the prospect of tea with Moody.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a character who has a magical eye and is offering Neville a cup of tea.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being almost defiantly when Moody asks if he's all right.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is introduced as a character who is frightened at the prospect of tea with Moody.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as watching Neville and Moody turn the corner.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who doesn't know what Moody was talking about.

relationships.description: Moody offers Neville a cup of tea.
Moody asks Harry if he's all right.
Neville is steered away by Moody.
Ron asks Hermione what Moody was talking about.
Neville looks pleadingly at Harry, Ron, and Hermione for help.
